data.trans_hint: Bà ấy không muốn tạo bất cứ áp lực nào lên các con mình.
data.en_hint: She doesn't want to put any pressure on her children.
data.content_game_1: She doesn't want to put any pressure on her children.
data.answer_en_hint: She doesn't want to put any pressure on her children.

data.trans: Thể hiện kỹ năng hay quyết tâm
data.trans_hint: Họ thể hiện quyết tâm chiến đấu rất mạnh nhưng lại thua.
data.en_hint: They put up a great fight but lost.
data.content_game_1: They put up a great fight but lost.
data.answer_en_hint: They put up a great fight but lost.

data.trans: Đặc biệt quan tâm, giúp đỡ
data.trans_hint: Xin đừng đặc biệt quan tâm vào chuyện của tôi.
data.en_hint: Please don't put yourself out on my bussiness.
data.content_game_1: Please don't put yourself out on my bussiness.
data.answer_en_hint: Please don't put yourself out on my bussiness.

data.content: put a brave face on it
data.trans_hint: Anh ta vẫn giữ bình thản dù vết thương rất nghiêm trọng.
data.en_hint: He still put a brave face on it even the pain was really serious.
data.content_game_1: He still put a brave face on it even the pain was really serious.
data.answer_en_hint: He still put a brave face on it even the pain was really serious.

data.content: put all your eggs in one basket
data.trans: Đặt tất cả trứng trong 1 giỏ
data.trans_hint: Đừng bao giờ đặt tất cả trứng trong cùng 1 giỏ! bạn nên mở rộng các lựa chọn của mình phòng khi có cái thất bại.
data.en_hint: Never put all your eggs in one basket! you should expand your options in case one is failed.
data.content_game_1: Never put all your eggs in one basket! you should expand your options in case one is failed.
data.answer_en_hint: Never put all your eggs in one basket! you should expand your options in case one is failed.

data.trans: Nói cho ai nắm rõ diễn biến (của sự việc gì đó)
data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ nói thêm để cậu nắm rõ diễn biến nếu biết thêm điều gì về vụ đó.
data.en_hint: I will put you in the picture when I know something more about that case.
data.content_game_1: I will put you in the picture when I know something more about that case.
data.answer_en_hint: I will put you in the picture when I know something more about that case.

data.trans_hint: Cậu ấy đã cho tôi ở nhờ trong vòng 2 tuần khi tôi đến thăm thành phố này.
data.en_hint: He put me up for 2 weeks when I visited the city.
data.content_game_1: He put me up for 2 weeks when I visited the city.
data.answer_en_hint: He put me up for 2 weeks when I visited the city.

data.trans: Quy cho cái gì là do cái gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ta quy cho thành công của tôi là do may mắn.
data.en_hint: She put my success down to good luck.
data.content_game_1: She put my success down to good luck.
data.answer_en_hint: She put my success down to good luck.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang mong ngóng khởi động dự án này càng sớm càng tốt.
data.en_hint: I'm longing to put this project on as soon as possible.
data.content_game_1: I'm longing to put this project on as soon as possible.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm longing to put this project on as soon as possible.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta nhanh chóng dập tắt đám cháy trước khi nó lan sang những chỗ khác.
data.en_hint: He quickly put the fire out before it spreaded out to other places.
data.content_game_1: He quickly put the fire out before it spreaded out to other places.
data.answer_en_hint: He quickly put the fire out before it spreaded out to other places.

data.trans_hint: Đừng có nói sai ý tôi như thế vì ý tôi hoàn toàn khác cơ.
data.en_hint: Don't put words in my mouth like that as what I meant was totally different.
data.content_game_1: Don't put words in my mouth like that as what I meant was totally different.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't put words in my mouth like that as what I meant was totally different.

data.trans: Đặt mình vào hoàn cảnh của ai
data.trans_hint: Bạn có thể thấu cảm người khác nếu biết đặt mình vào hoàn cảnh của họ.
data.en_hint: You can empathize other people if you know how to put yourself in their place.
data.content_game_1: You can empathize other people if you know how to put yourself in their place.
data.answer_en_hint: You can empathize other people if you know how to put yourself in their place.
